EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2021-11-18-HHS-TDH-Inpatient-Solution-Webinar.post-event-attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our event
EmailTemplate.textOnly: THANK YOU FOR ATTENDING: We hope you enjoyed the discussion For your convenience, we recorded the conversation between Jennifer Ball, Director of Virtual Care at Saint Luke’s Health System, and Tammy Cress, Director of Inpatient Care Solutions at Teladoc Health, as they discussed the integration of virtual care into inpatient care delivery. Check it out below! About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
